member_organisations:
SANANIM is a Czech non-governmental organization with legal status where is no membership as a base for legal status since 2014 (new Civil law). So 140 is number of employes. 
In Czech Republic SANANIM (represented by Jiri Richter) is member of the umbrela Association for Drug Services (A.N.O.; http://www.asociace.org) and Asociation of Social Services. 
In EU SANANIM is member in qute a few platforms and expert networks e.g. Correlation (www.correlation-net.org), EHRN, EHRA.
fields_of_interest: Employment and Social Affairs, Public Health
eu_initiatives: Drug Strategy and Drug Action Plan on EU level as well as within Czech Drug Policy.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar

Organisation is represented as member in various Czech Institutions, Government as vell as Regional organisation relevant to Drug policy.
